args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: RT @TeamTrumpPRESIDENT TRUMP: "[Kamala] can hide, she can lie through her surrogates and the corrupt media BUT THE TRUTH WILL WIN OUT.  The American people are smart, they will not be manipulated by Hollywood, the fake news media and all of the advertising.  And you deserve a president who respects you, talks to you, who levels with you, and who always has your best interests at heart... This November, we are going to tell Harris we have had enough."
